note.p: Birth: St Keverne, Cornwall, England (03 December 1744)
Career: Public orator, Cambridge; Master of the Temple; Vice Chancellor, Cambridge University (1789 and 1806); Dean of Ely; Master of Jesus College; published sermons (1787)
Notes: Birth date (index to BR) originally given as 3 December 1747, but changed to 1744, with note referring to memorial in chapel of Jesus College, Cambridge.
